attributes.action: increase the security at gigs/concerts to maintain the safety of those present
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gigs and concerts are constantly under threat due to the fact that many young people feel threatened due to threats of violence, under age drinking and smoking. This petition is for everyone who agrees that security should be increased to maintain the safety of all. However still allow people to enjoy themselves without the threat of unwanted violence.
